name: looter
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone, usually one of a large number of people during a violent event, who steals from shops and houses: Looters ransacked shops and set fire to cars. The museum galleries were stripped of artifacts by looters.
Indian English someone who steals something from a place or person: A mobile looter was arrested by police after he tried to steal a mobile and purse in broad daylight. See
loot
More examplesFewer examplesMobs of looters went on the rampage in several parts of the city.Pictures of people being arrested and of looter and rioters were shown on TV.The looters took valuables from four locked houses.
